reviews.positive_text:
Hotel Ibis budget Poisy Anncey & i found where to drink in town.

Not a bad hotel, only a couple of problems, hotel is 20 minutes away depending on traffic from Anncey centre, only problem is taxis cost on average 24‚Ç¨ one way so if you don't drive watch your funds, gate to hotel close's at 2300hrs depending who is on duty. 

Air con is still off so rooms are like saunas if sun it up, however 10% was taken off bill which paid for breakfasts. Thank you Hotel Ibis.

If your on the road side of hotel traffic is none stop on D3508 and around area, so can't leave window open which makes it a nightmare to sleep, was booked in from Friday to Friday and was going to leave but just chilled down and cracked on with things. 

Hotel is clean, tidy and some staff speak English other than that everything ok. Didn't try restaurant next door as read reviews and didn't like what i saw so ate in Anncey centre which again isn't cheap 10‚Ç¨ a pint of Guinness, Pizza on average 10 to 20‚Ç¨, mostly used Uber eats as deliver directly to hotel, however, best meeting them at door. 

Places to drink in the town Au Bureau 9.90‚Ç¨ Guinness opposite rail station (see photo for address), La Milton (opens Thursday to Monday) 10‚Ç¨ a pint of Guinness, Captain's Pub pint of Guinness 9.90‚Ç¨ but good music and boss pint, both in old town, although you have to wait to sit down, all 3 are in walking distance and good for people watching

8/10 scored.
